sentences.en: A proton is an elementary particle of matter.
sentences.cn: 质子是物质的基本粒子。

sentences.en: Another third of the elementary schools are actively working to acquire computers.
sentences.cn: 另有三分之一的小学正在积极准备添置计算机.

sentences.en: Augustine Hancock served as an elementary-school custodian for 20 years.
sentences.cn: 奥古斯丁·汉考克当小学看管人20年了。

sentences.en: He served as an elementary-school custodian for 20 years.
His classmates were labouring with elementary algebra.
sentences.cn: 他的同学们正在绞尽脑汁地演算初等代数题.

sentences.en: His lectures always proceed from the close to the distant and from the elementary to the profound.
sentences.cn: 他讲课总是由近及远,由浅入深.

sentences.en: I know a little elementary science.
I’m only familiar with the subject at an elementary level.
sentences.cn: 我对这门学科的了解只是初级水平。

sentences.en: It seems likely that this year will see a re-run of last year's fight over the elementary-school budget.
sentences.cn: 今年的小学预算问题很可能会像去年那样再次引发争论。

sentences.en: The cyclotron frequency can also be derived by an elementary argument.
sentences.cn: 回转频率也可以通过浅显的论证导出来.

sentences.en: the elementary principles of justice and democracy
sentences.cn: 正义和民主的基本信条

sentences.en: The new laws deprived many people of the most elementary freedoms.
sentences.cn: 新法律剥夺了许多人的最基本的自由.

sentences.en: The questions were so elementary that he easily passed the test.
sentences.cn: 问题很好答,他轻而易举就及格了.

sentences.en: The teacher was determined to drum some elementary arithmetic in.
sentences.cn: 教师决心把一些基本的算术知识装进学生的头脑中去.

sentences.en: Their course of study includes elementary hygiene and medical theory.
sentences.cn: 他们的课程包括基础卫生学和医疗知识.

sentences.en: This is one of the most elementary war propositions.
sentences.cn: 这是战争的最基本的命题之一.

sentences.en: What were you like in elementary school?
You’ve made a very elementary mistake.
sentences.cn: 你犯了一个非常基本的错误。

words.tran_cn: 基本的；主要的；自然力的；四大要素的（土、水、气、火）
元素；要素；原理；成分；自然环境

phrases.tran_cn: n. 初等教育，基本教育（指小学）
